name: hive-metastore
description: Apache Hive Metastore is the central repository of Hive Metadata. It stores the meta data for Hive tables and relations.
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 1 agent nodes with: 1.0 CPU, 1024 MB MEM and 1,5000 MB Disk.
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Hive Metastore service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.11 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at {{documentation-path}} uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
